mapper.sql: a.batch_id AS "batchId", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.merchant_login_name AS "merchantLoginName", a.merchant_company AS "merchantCompany", a.total_amount AS "totalAmount", a.total_num AS "totalNum", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.status AS "status", a.audit_time AS "auditTime", a.auditor AS "auditor", a.success_total_num AS "successTotalNum", a.success_total_amount AS "successTotalAmount", a.failed_total_num AS "failedTotalNum", a.failed_total_amount AS "failedTotalAmount", a.fee_type AS "feeType", a.fee_ratio AS "feeRatio", a.fee_total_amount AS "feeTotalAmount", a.request_source AS "requestSource", a.finish_time AS "finishTime", a.batch_file_name AS "batchFileName", a.batch_file_path AS "batchFilePath", a.heepay_batch_no AS "heepayBatchNo", a.trans_way AS "transWay", a.record_source AS "recordSource", a.extend3 AS "extend3", a.extend4 AS "extend4", a.extend5 AS "extend5"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hgms_temporary_collection_record( batch_id, merchant_id, merchant_login_name, merchant_company, total_amount, total_num, create_time, update_time, status, audit_time, auditor, success_total_num, success_total_amount, failed_total_num, failed_total_amount, fee_type, fee_ratio, fee_total_amount, request_source, finish_time, batch_file_name, batch_file_path, heepay_batch_no, trans_way, record_source, extend3, extend4, extend5 ) VALUES ( #{batchId}, #{merchantId}, #{merchantLoginName}, #{merchantCompany}, #{totalAmount}, #{totalNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{auditTime}, #{auditor}, #{successTotalNum}, #{successTotalAmount}, #{failedTotalNum}, #{failedTotalAmount}, #{feeType}, #{feeRatio}, #{feeTotalAmount}, #{requestSource}, #{finishTime}, #{batchFileName}, #{batchFilePath}, #{heepayBatchNo}, #{transWay}, #{recordSource}, #{extend3}, #{extend4}, #{extend5} )
mapper.update: UPDATE hgms_temporary_collection_record SET batch_id = #{batchId}, merchant_id = #{merchantId}, merchant_login_name = #{merchantLoginName}, merchant_company = #{merchantCompany}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, total_num = #{totalNum}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, status = #{status}, audit_time = #{auditTime}, auditor = #{auditor}, success_total_num = #{successTotalNum}, success_total_amount = #{successTotalAmount}, failed_total_num = #{failedTotalNum}, failed_total_amount = #{failedTotalAmount}, fee_type = #{feeType}, fee_ratio = #{feeRatio}, fee_total_amount = #{feeTotalAmount}, request_source = #{requestSource}, finish_time = #{finishTime}, batch_file_name = #{batchFileName}, batch_file_path = #{batchFilePath}, heepay_batch_no = #{heepayBatchNo}, trans_way = #{transWay}, record_source = #{recordSource}, extend3 = #{extend3}, extend4 = #{extend4}, extend5 = #{extend5} WHERE id = #{id}
